text: Ed Hughes (1927–2000) was American football player and coach. Ed Hughes may also refer to: * Ed Hughes (actor), English actor in This House (play) * Ed Hughes (anchor) (1938–2004), former news anchor in Norfolk, Virginia * Ed Hughes (baseball) (1880–1927), baseball player * Ed Hughes (composer) (born 1968), British composer == See also == * Edward Hughes (disambiguation) *Eddie Hughes (disambiguation)
title: Ed Hughes (disambiguation)
